results.description: Eintracht Frankfurt captain David Abraham shoulder barges Freiburg manager Christian Streich, sparking a brawl in which two red cards were shown.
results.shortTitle: Watch: Frankfurt captain sent off after barging opposition manager
results.title: Bundesliga: Eintracht Frankfurt captain sent off after barging opposition manager

results.description: Eintracht Frankfurt captain David Abraham is sent off for barging over SC Freiburg coach Christian Streich in a fiery Bundesliga clash.
results.shortTitle: Freiburg coach Streich barged over in fiery clash
results.title: SC Freiburg 1-0 Eintracht Frankfurt: Abraham sent off for pushing Streich

results.description: Axel Witsel scores a stunning volley direct from a Thorgan Hazard corner in Dortmund's 2-2 draw against Freiburg.
results.shortTitle: Watch Witsel nets stunning volley in Dortmund draw
results.title: Axel Witsel: Borussia Dortmund midfielder nets stunning volley in draw against Freiburg

results.description: Manuel Akanji scores a 90th-minute own goal as Borussia Dortmund draw 2-2 with Freiburg for their third consecutive Bundesliga draw.
results.shortTitle: Freiburg secure late draw with Dortmund
results.title: SC Freiburg 2-2 Borussia Dortmund: Late own goal denies Dortmund win

thumbnail.altText: Freiburg players celebrate an equaliser against Borussia Dortmund

results.description: Borussia Dortmund maintain their title challenge with a comfortable win at Freiburg, to move within a point of Bundesliga leaders Bayern Munich.
results.shortTitle: Dortmund win to keep pressure on Bayern
results.title: Bundesliga: Borussia Dortmund win at Freiburg to keep pressure on Bayern Munich

results.description: Borussia Dortmund score two late goals to beat Wolfsburg in the Bundesliga and leapfrog Bayern Munich, who drew at Freiburg, at the top of the table.
results.shortTitle: Dortmund back on top as Bayern stumble
results.title: Bundesliga: Borussia Dortmund take top spot as Bayern Munich stumble

results.description: Manchester City's Champions League opponents Schalke earn a goalless draw with Freiburg despite playing with 10 men for 48 minutes.
results.shortTitle: Schalke prepare for Man City with draw
results.title: Schalke 0-0 Freiburg: Suat Serdar sent off for hosts before Man City tie

thumbnail.altText: Suat Serdar of Schalke challenges Freiburg's Vicenzo Grifo

results.description: Paco Alcacer continues his incredible scoring run as Borussia Dortmund maintain their unbeaten start to the Bundesliga season by beating Freiburg.
results.shortTitle: Dortmund go seven clear with victory
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 2-0 Freiburg: Unbeaten leaders go seven clear with victory

results.description: Leicester City reach an agreement with Freiburg to sign Turkey defender Caglar Soyuncu and sign Filip Benkovic for a reported £13m fee.
results.title: Leicester City agree Caglar Soyuncu deal and sign Filip Benkovic for undisclosed fee

results.description: Referee Guido Winkmann recalls the Mainz and Freiburg players from their dressing rooms at half-time to award a penalty given by VAR.
results.shortTitle: Is this the most bizarre use of VAR so far?
results.title: VAR in Bundesliga: Mainz & Freiburg players called back at half-time for penalty

results.description: A penalty was awarded after players had already left the pitch for half-time in Mainz's Bundesliga win over relegation rivals Freiburg on Monday.
results.shortTitle: Mainz awarded VAR penalty at half-time
results.title: Mainz v Freiburg: Hosts awarded penalty on VAR after half-time whistle blown

thumbnail.altText: Mainz's Pablo de Blasis speaks with referee Guido Winkmann before taking his penalty against Freiburg

results.description: Bayern Munich close in on their sixth consecutive Bundesliga title with a comfortable victory over Freiburg.
results.title: SC Freiburg 0-4 Bayern Munich

results.description: Arsenal target Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang helps Borussia Dortmund to a 2-2 draw with Freiburg in the Bundesliga.
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 2-2 SC Freiburg

results.description: Bayern Munich thrash Freiburg in manager Jupp Heynckes' first game back in charge of the reigning Bundesliga champions.
results.title: Bayern Munich 5-0 SC Freiburg

results.description: Liverpool complete the £35m signing of England midfielder Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain from Arsenal on a five-year deal.
results.title: Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain: Liverpool sign Arsenal midfielder for £35m

results.description: Robert Lewandowski scores a brilliant injury-time winner as Bayern Munich come from behind to beat Freiburg.
results.title: Freiburg 1-2 Bayern Munich

results.description: RB Leipzig extend their lead at the top of the Bundesliga table to six points after an easy win at Freiburg.
results.title: Sport-Club Freiburg 1-4 RB Leipzig
